item.title: Nautilus Script antivirus scan
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello everyone today I propose un’estenzione nautilus that simplifies scanzione antivirus on linux. You may wonder now what is a virus on linux: a) To scanzionare files before transferring them on Windows (prevention) b) For a hard-disk scanzionare infected (care) The script created by me iterfaccia has a graphic that will follow you step by […]

item.title: Compress pdf script with Nautilus
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: After doing a search on the net I found that pdf file compression is quite dark! To make life easier I created a script Nautilus (tested on version 10.04 and 11.04 of ubuntu 64bit, but working with all of them) The script compresses the pdf looking for in the can to maintain good visual quality. […]

item.title: Create multiboot USB stick linux
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: nb: This procedure can only be performed by ubuntu distro download the iso of live linux distro that you like Install UNetbootin (sudo apt-get install unetbootin) Insert USB stick into your computer Install a memory stick with unetbootin iso (ubuntu to be installed last) the memory stick and create a folder with the name of […]
